name: Penguin Mania! - Downhill Race to Survive
name_original: Penguin Mania! - Downhill Race to Survive
description:
Penguins zooming down snow covered hills! Polar Bears flying past. Tree stumps and igloos in the way. It’s crazy!! It’s Mania!

Timmy the Penguin is racing downhill but must avoid lots of obstacles. Can he succeed? Can you? Gather gold and silver coins to unlock special characters, even Varth Dader, the Empire’s evil sledder.

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Great Time-Killer Game!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Penguin Mania! Now!!!
